mapper.select: SELECT 'notice' AS category , n.notice_seq AS seq , n.notice_title AS title , n.notice_contents AS contents , TO_CHAR(notice_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regDate , u.user_name AS userName , u.user_seq AS userSeq , 'N/A' AS originalFileName , 'N/A' AS filePath , 'N/A' AS saveFileName FROM NOTICE n JOIN USER1 u ON n.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE (NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR NOTICE_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') UNION ALL SELECT 'image' AS category , pf.file_num AS seq , pf.originalfilename AS title , 'N/A' AS contents , TO_CHAR(pf.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regDate , u.user_name AS userName , u.user_seq AS userSeq , pf.originalfilename AS originalFileName , pf.file_path AS filePath , pf.savefilename AS saveFileName FROM PHOTO_FILE pf JOIN USER1 u ON pf.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE (pf.ORIGINALFILENAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY regDate DESC
